summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SpeedTest app - all functionality working perfectly. Backend APIs tested (ping, download, upload), frontend UI tested with full speed test flow (ping -> jitter -> download -> upload phases), and integration verified.
passed_tests: Backend ping endpoint with timestamp response
Frontend app loading with speedometer and INITIATE TEST button
Speed test initiation and button state changes
Ping phase execution and result display (133.5ms)
Jitter phase execution and result display (45.8ms)
Download phase execution and result display (209.4 Mbps)
Upload phase execution and result display (18.5 Mbps)
Test completion with TEST AGAIN button appearance
Result cards showing numerical values after test completion
Reset functionality clearing all results back to '--'
Proper result card layout and animations
